scripts.package-prep-copy: npm run clean-package && cp ./package.json ./lambda && cp ./package.json ./lambda-layer && cp ./package-lock.json ./lambda-layer
scripts.package-prep-layer: cd ./lambda-layer && npm ci --omit=dev && mkdir nodejs && mv node_modules ./nodejs/
scripts.package-prep: npm run package-prep-copy && npm run package-prep-layer
scripts.package: npm run package-prep && npm run package-function && npm run package-layer
